isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Crankcase, Crankshaft, Connecting Rods, And Pistons - Flywheel and Flywheel Housing - Check Flywheel Housing Face Runout

svcproc.title: Check Flywheel Housing Face Runout

figure.caption: Checking the Flywheel Housing Face Runout

svcproc.para: Keep crankshaft end play at zero in the same direction for all measurements.

step1.para: Attach a dial indicator magnetic base to the flywheel and place the indicator tip against housing face.
Measure at four points 90° apart for a total face variation. Compare the average to the specification for the flywheel housing face runout tolerance.
